scripts.build-react: cd frontend && yarn run test:lint && yarn run build
scripts.build-be: cd backend && yarn run test:lint && yarn build
scripts.build: yarn run build-react && yarn run build-be && yarn run merge-projects
scripts.pre-install-deps: npm install -g yarn && yarn add -g typescript react-scripts
scripts.install-deps: yarn run pre-install-deps && yarn run install-deps:be && yarn run install-deps:react
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf frontend/build
scripts.docker:build: RUN npm run build-with-deps && docker build
